Class ServiceListPortlet

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType>, EventListener, org.jgrapes.core.Channel, org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType, org.jgrapes.core.Eligible, org.jgrapes.core.Manager, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener

    public class ServiceListPortlet
extends org.jgrapes.portal.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerPortlet
implements org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener

    A portlet for inspecting the services in an OSGi runtime.
